channel.title: R on IFF自留地
channel.description: Recent content in R on IFF自留地

item.title: Workflow with Caret
item.description: All the packages needed in here: library(knitr) library(caret) library(DiagrammeR)#for the flowchart library(DescTools)# for summary of data library(proxy)#maxDissim library(mlbench)#data zoo library(data.table) library(fastDummies) #for dummy variables options(scipen=8) Foreword This is a workflow about caret, which is a creating predicted models collecting toolkit framework, integrating all activities related to model development from other R packages. Caret can be also treated as a tool to get started or get familiar with machine learning, especially in supervised and unsupervised learning part that is good at.

item.title: R实现的数据模拟
item.description: 数据模拟 数据模拟最直接的意义在于更好的便于R语言操作和统计学知识的练习。但另一方面，也是对市场分析中数据分析的逻辑和内在关联的总结演练。 促销
